Distance Entity to Point

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Info - Distance Entity to Point
Shortcut: I, E
Commands: infodistep | ie

Description:

This tool measures the exact distance between an entity and a point given by the user.

Procedure:

  1. Specify the entity.
  2. Use the mouse to specify the location of the point or enter a coordinate in the command line.
  3. The measured distance is printed on screen and in the command line.
